TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceProcessInstaller extends System.Configuration.Install.ComponentInstaller

summary.span: 安裝包含擴充 類別的可執行檔。

span.span: Installs an executable containing classes that extend .

summary.span: 當安裝服務應用程式時，這個類別是由安裝公用程式呼叫，例如 InstallUtil.exe。

span.span: This class is called by installation utilities, such as InstallUtil.exe, when installing a service application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 運作通用於所有服務的可執行檔中。The does work common to all services in an executable. 安裝公用程式用來撰寫與您想要安裝的服務相關聯的登錄值。It is used by the installation utility to write registry values associated with services you want to install. 若要安裝的服務，建立專案的安裝程式類別繼承自，並設定若要在類別上`true`。To install a service, create a project installer class that inherits from , and set the on the class to `true`. 在您專案中，執行個體化一個執行個體，每個服務應用程式和一個應用程式中的每個服務執行個體。Within your project, instantiate one instance per service application, and one instance for each service in the application. 最後，新增執行個體和專案安裝程式類別的執行個體。Finally, add the instance and the instances to your project installer class. 當執行 InstallUtil.exe 時，此公用程式會尋找服務組件中的類別設定為`true`。When InstallUtil.exe runs, the utility looks for classes in the service assembly with the set to `true`. 將類別加入至服務組件中，加入至專案安裝程式相關聯的集合。Add classes to the service assembly by adding them to the collection associated with your project installer. 如果是`false`，安裝公用程式會忽略專案安裝程式。If is `false`, the install utility ignores the project installer. 執行個體，您可以修改的屬性包括指定服務應用程式執行的帳戶登入的使用者以外。For an instance of , properties you can modify include specifying that a service application run under an account other than the logged-on user. 您可以指定特定並配對所在服務應該執行，或是您可以使用指定電腦的 System 帳戶、 本機或網路服務帳戶或使用者帳戶下執行的服務。You can specify a particular and pair under which the service should run, or you can use to specify that the service run under the computer's System account, a local or network service account, or a user account. > [!NOTE] > 電腦的系統帳戶不是系統管理員帳戶相同。The computer's System account is not the same as the Administrator account. 一般來說，您未呼叫的方法上內您的程式碼; 它們通常稱為只能由安裝公用程式。Normally, you do not call the methods on within your code; they are generally called only by the install utility. 安裝公用程式會自動呼叫和安裝程序期間的方法。The install utility automatically calls the and methods during the installation process. 它會出失敗，如有必要，藉由呼叫(或) 上所有先前安裝的元件。It backs out failures, if necessary, by calling (or ) on all previously installed components. 應用程式的安裝常式會維護的資訊會自動使用專案安裝程式的元件已安裝， 。An application's install routine maintains information automatically about the components already installed, using the project installer's . 此狀態資訊會持續更新為執行個體和每個公用程式會安裝執行個體。This state information is continuously updated as the instance and each instance is installed by the utility. 它是通常不需要為您的程式碼，明確地修改此狀態資訊。It is usually unnecessary for your code to modify this state information explicitly. 具現化會導致的基底類別建構函式，呼叫。Instantiating a causes the base class constructor, , to be called. ## Examples 下列範例會建立專案安裝程式呼叫 MyProjectInstaller，繼承自。The following example creates a project installer called MyProjectInstaller, which inherits from . 它會假設沒有服務可執行檔，其中包含兩個服務，「 Hello World 服務 1 」 和 「 Hello World 服務 2 」。It is assumed there is a service executable that contains two services, "Hello-World Service 1" and "Hello-World Service 2". MyProjectInstaller （這會由安裝公用程式呼叫） 的建構函式內物件會針對每個服務，和建立可執行檔。Within the constructor for MyProjectInstaller (which would be called by the install utility), objects are created for each service, and a is created for the executable. 若要將 MyProjectInstaller 辨識為有效的安裝程式中，安裝公用程式屬性設為`true`。For the install utility to recognize MyProjectInstaller as a valid installer, the attribute is set to `true`. 選擇性屬性在設定程序安裝程式和服務安裝程式之前安裝程式會新增至集合。Optional properties are set on the process installer and the service installers before the installers are added to the collection. 物件時，安裝公用程式會存取 MyProjectInstaller，加入至集合，透過呼叫將接著安裝。When the install utility accesses MyProjectInstaller, the objects added to the collection through a call to will be installed in turn. 在過程中，安裝程式會維護指出已安裝哪些物件，因此每個物件可以依序發生安裝失敗時的狀態資訊。During the process, the installer maintains state information indicating which objects have been installed, so each object can be backed out in turn in case of an installation failure. 一般來說，您不具現化專案安裝程式類別明確。Normally, you would not instantiate your project installer class explicitly. 您會建立它，並加入，但安裝公用程式會實際呼叫，並因此會具現化，該類別。You would create it and add the , but the install utility actually calls, and therefore instantiates, the class. [!code-cpp[Classic ServiceInstaller Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ServiceInstaller Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ServiceInstaller Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ServiceInstaller Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ServiceInstaller Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ServiceInstaller Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 建立 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceProcess::ServiceAccount Account { System::ServiceProcess::ServiceAccount get(); void set(System::ServiceProcess::ServiceAccount value); };
member this.Account : System.ServiceProcess.ServiceAccount with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要執行這個服務應用程式的帳戶類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of account under which to run this service application.

value.span: ，定義系統執行這個服務的帳號類型，

span.span: A that defines the type of account under which the system runs this service.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性是`User`，則和屬性用來定義服務應用程式執行所在的帳戶。When the property is `User`, the and properties are used to define an account under which the service application runs. 和組可讓服務系統帳戶以外的帳戶下執行。The and pair allows the service to run under an account other than the system account. 這可以比方說，讓服務在重新開機，沒有任何使用者登入時自動啟動。This can, for example, allow the service to start automatically at reboot, when no user is logged on. 如果您將保留其中一個或空的而且設定到`User`，將會提示您輸入有效的使用者名稱和密碼進行安裝時。If you leave either the or empty and set to `User`, you will be prompted for a valid user name and password at installation. 您也可以指定本機系統帳戶或本機執行的服務或網路服務。You can also specify that the service run under the local system account, or as a local or network service. 請參閱列舉類型的帳戶的詳細資訊。See the enumeration for details on types of accounts.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void CopyFromComponent(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent comp) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub CopyFromComponent (comp As IComponent)

span.span: The that represents the service process.

summary.span: 不以 類別特定行為實作基底類別 方法。

span.span: Implements the base class method with no class-specific behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不應該呼叫這個方法，您的程式碼。This method should not be called within your code. 上的基底類別方法是`abstract`，因此它這裡實作在衍生類別上。The base class method on is `abstract`, so it is implemented here on the derived class. 不過，沒有任何類別的特定方法的實作中的處理。However, there is no class-specific processing in the method's implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property HelpText As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ HelpText { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得說明文字，顯示服務安裝選項。

span.span: Gets help text displayed for service installation options.

value.span: 說明文字，提供設定在特定帳戶下執行服務的使用者名稱和密碼之描述步驟。

span.span: Help text that provides a description of the steps for setting the user name and password in order to run the service under a particular account.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 手動啟動服務時，可以使用此說明文字。This help text can be used when a service starts manually. 表示使用者輸入使用者名稱和密碼資訊的方法。It indicates to the user how to enter user name and password information.

summary.span: 將服務應用程式資訊寫入登錄，

span.span: Writes service application information to the registry.

summary.span: 這個方法是安裝工具所使用的方法，安裝工具會自動呼叫適當的方法。

span.span: This method is meant to be used by installation tools, which call the appropriate methods automatically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般來說，您未呼叫的方法上內您的程式碼; 它們通常稱為只能由安裝公用程式。Normally, you do not call the methods on within your code; they are generally called only by the install utility. 安裝公用程式會自動呼叫安裝程序期間的方法。The install utility automatically calls the method during the installation process. 它會出失敗，如有必要，藉由呼叫上所有先前安裝的元件。It backs out failures, if necessary, by calling on all previously installed components. 此方法會傳遞至基底類別的安裝方法。This method passes the installation to the base class method. 一般來說，您會呼叫方法上內您的程式碼; 它們通常稱為只能由安裝公用程式。Normally, you will not call the methods on within your code; they are generally called only by the install utility. 安裝公用程式會自動呼叫和安裝程序期間的方法。The install utility automatically calls the and methods during the installation process. 它會出失敗，如有必要，藉由呼叫(或) 上所有先前安裝的元件It backs out failures, if necessary, by calling (or ) on all previously installed components 應用程式的安裝常式會維護的資訊會自動使用專案安裝程式的元件已安裝， 。An application's install routine maintains information automatically about the components already installed, using the project installer's . 這個狀態資訊，將會傳入作為`stateSaver`參數，會持續更新為執行個體和每個公用程式會安裝執行個體。This state information, passed into as the `stateSaver` parameter, is continuously updated as the instance and each instance is installed by the utility. 它是通常不需要為您的程式碼，明確地修改此狀態資訊。It is usually unnecessary for your code to modify this state information explicitly. 將基底類別方法所擲回任何例外狀況傳遞至呼叫的方法或 / 事件處理常式。 passes to the calling method any exceptions thrown by base class methods or / event handlers.

span.span: The is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Password { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Password : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定與執行服務應用程式的使用者帳戶相關的密碼。

span.span: Gets or sets the password associated with the user account under which the service application runs.

value.span: 密碼，與應執行服務的帳戶相關。

span.span: The password associated with the account under which the service should run.
The default is an empty string ("").

value.span: 屬性不是公用的，而且無法被序列化。

span.span: The property is not public, and is never serialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和組可讓服務系統帳戶以外的帳戶下執行。The and pair allows the service to run under an account other than the system account. 這可以比方說，讓服務在重新開機，沒有任何使用者登入時自動啟動。This can, for example, allow the service to start automatically at reboot, when no user is logged on. 並，因為它們永遠不會序列化或儲存至的安裝狀態，以安全的方式處理 (專案安裝程式的) 或其他公開存取的位置。 and are handled in a secure manner in that they are never serialized or saved to the install state (the project installer's ) or other location with public access. 設定和可讓系統在安裝期間會自動與服務相關聯的帳戶。Setting the and allows an account to be associated automatically with the service at install time. 如果您將保留其中一個或空的而且設定到`User`，將會提示您輸入有效的使用者名稱和密碼進行安裝時。If you leave either the or empty and set to `User`, you will be prompted for a valid user name and password at installation. 執行個別的帳戶服務的另一個選項是使用電腦的系統帳戶。Another option for running a service under a separate account is to use the computer's System account. 該帳戶，也就是不同的系統管理員帳戶，不需要密碼。That account, which is distinct from the Administrator account, requires no password. 系統帳戶的權限可能會超過目前登入的使用者。The System account's privileges may exceed those of the user currently logged in. 在系統帳戶下執行，而不是使用者帳戶可避免因使用者缺乏權限的問題，服務需要Running under the System account rather than a user account avoids problems resulting from the user lacking a permission the service requires 如果而不是任何值`User`，指定使用的帳戶 （本機或網路服務或本機系統） 是，即使和屬性都會填入。If is any value other than `User`, the specifed account (local or network service, or local system) is used, even if the and properties are populated.

summary.span: 這個方法是安裝工具所使用的方法，安裝工具會自動處理適當的方法。

span.span: This method is meant to be used by installation tools, which process the appropriate methods automatically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般來說，您未呼叫的方法上內您的程式碼; 它們通常稱為只能由安裝公用程式。Normally, you do not call the methods on within your code; they are generally called only by the install utility. 安裝公用程式會自動呼叫安裝程序期間的方法。The install utility automatically calls the method during the installation process. 它會出失敗，如有必要，藉由呼叫產生例外狀況物件上。It backs out failures, if necessary, by calling on the object that generated the exception. 應用程式的安裝常式會維護的資訊會自動使用專案安裝程式的元件已安裝， 。An application's install routine maintains information automatically about the components already installed, using the project installer's . 這個狀態資訊，將會傳入作為`savedState`參數，會持續更新為執行個體和每個公用程式會安裝執行個體。This state information, passed into as the `savedState` parameter, is continuously updated as the instance and each instance is installed by the utility. 它是通常不需要為您的程式碼，明確地修改此狀態資訊。It is usually unnecessary for your code to modify this state information explicitly. 將基底類別方法所擲回任何例外狀況傳遞至呼叫的方法或 / 事件處理常式。 passes to the calling method any exceptions thrown by base class methods or / event handlers.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Username { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Username : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定將要執行服務應用程式的使用者帳戶。

span.span: Gets or sets the user account under which the service application will run.
The account under which the service should run.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和組可讓服務系統帳戶以外的帳戶下執行。The and pair allows the service to run under an account other than the system account. 這可以比方說，讓服務在重新開機，沒有任何使用者登入時自動啟動。This can, for example, allow the service to start automatically at reboot, when no user is logged on. 並，因為它們永遠不會序列化或儲存至的安裝狀態，以安全的方式處理 (專案安裝程式的) 或其他公開存取的位置。 and are handled in a secure manner in that they are never serialized or saved to the install state (the project installer's ) or other location with public access. 設定和可讓系統在安裝期間會自動與服務相關聯的帳戶。Setting the and allows an account to be associated automatically with the service at install time. 如果您將保留其中一個或空的而且設定到`User`，將會提示您輸入有效的使用者名稱和密碼進行安裝時。If you leave either the or empty and set to `User`, you will be prompted for a valid user name and password at installation. 執行個別的帳戶服務的另一個選項是使用電腦的系統帳戶。Another option for running a service under a separate account is to use the computer's System account. 該帳戶，也就是不同的系統管理員帳戶，不需要密碼。That account, which is distinct from the Administrator account, requires no password. 系統帳戶的權限可能會超過目前登入的使用者。The System account's privileges may exceed those of the user currently logged in. 在系統帳戶下執行，而不是使用者帳戶可避免因使用者缺乏權限的問題，服務需要Running under the System account rather than a user account avoids problems resulting from the user lacking a permission the service requires 如果而不是任何值`User`，會使用指定的帳戶 （本機或網路服務或本機系統），即使和屬性都會填入。If is any value other than `User`, the specified account (local or network service, or local system) is used, even if the and properties are populated.
